features.situation: from others in any situation where No Sense of Humor becomes evident

tpITOIhTAzXUVPUxi.name: Mild Shyness
tpITOIhTAzXUVPUxi.notes: You are uneasy with strangers, especially assertive or attractive ones.

tgCvVCoDVED4bKpiQ.notes: -6 to Vision rolls to spot items more than 1 yd away; -2 to all melee attacks; double actual distance to the target when calculating the range modifier for ranged attacks
tgCvVCoDVED4bKpiQ.name: Bad Sight (Nearsighted)

tOgcqoJalS_80Xqxz.notes: Make a self-control roll in any situation where you could render aid or are specifically asked for help, but should resist the urge
tOgcqoJalS_80Xqxz.name: Charitable

tyOzUnNJ5ADNwFHow.name: Manic-Depressive
tyOzUnNJ5ADNwFHow.notes: At the beginning of each play session, roll 1d. On 1-3, you are in your manic phase; 4-6 indicates depression. Every five hours of game time thereafter, roll 3d. A 10 or less indicates that you begin a mood swing. Over the next hour, you shift from your current phase to the opposite one. You remain in the new phase for at least five hours, after which you must again roll 3d.

tDoTnVRs3MEc5elVI.name: Curious
tDoTnVRs3MEc5elVI.notes: Make a self-control roll when presented with an interesting item or situation

tyaL8AUCa1NpSVFAl.notes: Make a self-control roll any time you suffer damage over 1/4 your HP in the space of one second, and whenever you witness equivalent harm to a loved one
tyaL8AUCa1NpSVFAl.name: Berserk

tYG5e9qCKsYlUm12g.notes: -2 to IQ-based skills when alone, or -1 in a group of 4 or less
tYG5e9qCKsYlUm12g.name: Gregarious

tItDQaXY6a03b0wVt.notes: You are very uncomfortable around strangers, and tend to be quiet even among friends.
tItDQaXY6a03b0wVt.name: Severe Shyness

tG8oqT-saFOedpELA.notes: Make a self-control roll whenever it would be wise to wait and ponder. If you fail, you must act
tG8oqT-saFOedpELA.name: Impulsiveness

tee45z3kBQVeHeTRV.name: Bad Sight (Farsighted)
tee45z3kBQVeHeTRV.notes: -6 to Vision rolls to spot items within 1 yd; -3 DX to any close manual task, including close combat
